title: How to Make Levels in LittleBigPlanet

steps.headline: Think of a story.
steps.description: Do you want to save a princess and destroy the enemy's castle? Fight aliens in outer space? Make your choice. Like a certain game, such as Mario, Kirby, Legend of Zelda, Spyro, etc.? You can make a level based on one of those games.

steps.headline: Think of some moments of peril (MOP) for the level, according to the story.
steps.description: Don't be cheap and just put fire on the ground; be creative!

steps.headline: Think of a difficulty for your level.
steps.description: Is it so easy a blind man could do it or is it so hard that you have to cheat to beat the level?

steps.headline: Make a plan on paper.
steps.description: There is a site called LittleBigPlanet Workshop you can go to and go to the Blueprint Room to make one as well.

steps.headline: Begin.
steps.description: One thing you could do is make a person stand near the entrance and fill you in, like "Help! Our city is on fire!" or "Welcome to the carnival."

steps.headline: Colour it.
steps.description: Be creative and add lots of stickers! The only exception is a level theme where you have to recolour something!

steps.headline: Add the finishing touches.
steps.description: Make the waves curvier, or make the level look better with more stickers.

steps.headline: Publish.
steps.description: Make a title, description, and just wait for the views to roll in.

text: Think of a story. Do you want to save a princess and destroy the enemy's castle? Fight aliens in outer space? Make your choice. Like a certain game, such as Mario, Kirby, Legend of Zelda, Spyro, etc.? You can make a level based on one of those games. Think of some moments of peril (MOP) for the level, according to the story. Don't be cheap and just put fire on the ground; be creative! Think of a difficulty for your level. Is it so easy a blind man could do it or is it so hard that you have to cheat to beat the level? Make a plan on paper. There is a site called LittleBigPlanet Workshop you can go to and go to the Blueprint Room to make one as well. Begin. One thing you could do is make a person stand near the entrance and fill you in, like "Help! Our city is on fire!" or "Welcome to the carnival." Colour it. Be creative and add lots of stickers! The only exception is a level theme where you have to recolour something! Add the finishing touches. Make the waves curvier, or make the level look better with more stickers. Publish. Make a title, description, and just wait for the views to roll in.
